body_html:
It seems to be some edge-case when trying to obtain "kernel reported version"
stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc:189

It seems to be tricky to reproduce, I get it only for some combination of LD_LIBRARY_PATH/DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH and not for others, I'll close it for now since I can't make a good repro

body:
It seems to be some edge-case when trying to obtain "kernel reported version" 
[stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc:189](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/d42facc3cc9611f0c9722c81551a7404a0bd3f6b/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc#L189)

It seems to be tricky to reproduce, I get it only for some combination of LD_LIBRARY_PATH/DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH and not for others, I'll close it for now since I can't make a good repro
